title: Vote for cancelling the liquidity incentives of ForTube BSC
body:
In September 2020, ForTube successfully completed the migration and deployment of the BSC version of ForTube, began to provide decentralized lending services for users in the BSC ecosystem. At the same time, the liquidity incentive activities was launched. Users that provide liquidity to ForTube BSC can get FOR tokens.

At present, ForTube V3 has been launched. According to the planning of the roadmap, in order to provide users with more flexible and higher profit value capture opportunities, ForTube will successively launch the Earning, Farming, FDAO and other sectors. On April 8th, ForTube “Mining” section has been officially launched, and the first phase of ARPA combo mining activity is live now.

From the perspective of technology and operation, the current liquidity incentive plan of BSC version is no longer applicable to the development trend of the BSC ecosystem, and it also obstructs the smooth implementation of ForTube's new functions. Therefore, the proposal to cancel the liquidity incentives of ForTube BSC is now submitted to the ForTube community, and users can vote through Snapshot.

Voting time: April 9th ​​18:00 to April 10th 18:00 (GMT+8)
 
A: Proposal to stop the liquidity incentives of BSC version (100,000 FOR per day)
B: Proposal to continue the liquidity incentives of BSC version (100,000 FOR per day)

关于取消ForTube BSC 版本资产挖矿的提案
 
2020年9月，ForTube成功完成BSC版本的迁移部署，开始为BSC生态用户提供去中心化的借贷服务，并同步开启了流动性激励活动，将FOR代币分发给为ForTube BSC版本提供流动性的用户。
 
 
目前， ForTube V3版本已经推出。按照路线图的规划，Earning，Farming，FDAO等板块将陆续上线
将为用户提供更加灵活，更高收益的价值捕获机会。4月8日，ForTube的【上币挖矿】板块已经上线，首期ARPA联合挖矿活动正在进行。
 
从技术维度和运营层面来看， 当前的BSC版本流动性激励计划已经不再适用BSC生态的发展趋势，也阻碍了ForTube全新功能的顺利实施。因此，现将取消ForTube BSC 版本流动性激励的提案提交ForTube社区，用户可通过Snapshot进行投票。
 
投票时间：  4月9日 18:00 至  4月10日18:00 
 
A：停止BSC版本流动性激励的提案（每天10万FOR）
B：继续BSC版本流动性激励的提案（每天10万FOR）
author: 0xd49524f9FDC4EA8ba65345253C2B9FdE3b6FAF3A
